column4: hi there can any body can tell me in which folder this updates files are located so that i can use it out on other system  i mean to say on my friends laptop  and what are the point that i have to consider because  at his place there is no internet accese
please help
/var/cache/apt/archives/ , see also the information ubottu's about to give you
Direct Rendering and compiz/visual effects are different things, by the way. You can have one without the other. But disabling Compiz if it's active is a good idea :)
ya..thats what i suggested
what do you think that command should do?
the which command outputs the string ie the file path...and ln should count it
isnt it??
ln is used to making symlinks, not for counting things
oh sorry my mistake....take the another thing.....
which ssh | ldd
why doesnt this work
presumably because ldd is also not for counting things
are you trying to print the shared module dependencies of the ssh program?
no i know that...but the output  of which is not passed to ldd
yes
ldd `which ssh`
i know that ldd /usr/bin/ssh will do
llutz but why the way i said dont work??
llutz whats the reason
because | pipes the stdout of which to the stdin of ldd, which is entirely different from putting the output of which in the argument list of ldd
